saas.title: Innexar SaaS - Business Management (ERP)
saas.subtitle: A fully rebrandable, multi-tenant ERP SaaS platform for SMBs
saas.overviewDescription: A web-based, multi-tenant ERP platform designed for small and medium businesses. The solution offers secure, branded instances via subdomains with automated provisioning and flexible module activation according to plans.
saas.objective: Provide an integrated management suite that supports commercial, administrative and operational workflows, online plan subscriptions, automated tenant provisioning, and modular billing.
saas.tech: Backend in Python, PostgreSQL, frontend in modern JavaScript, containerized deployments (Docker/Kubernetes), wildcard DNS for subdomains and integrations with payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal).
saas.featuresSubtitle: Built with scalability and security in mind, our platform provides everything you need to run a successful SaaS business.

feature1.title: Multi-Tenant Architecture
feature1.description: Secure, isolated environments for each client with shared infrastructure for optimal cost efficiency.

hero.title: Choose your
hero.subtitle: We offer two powerful SaaS solutions: the multi-tenant Innexar ERP and StructurOne, focused on construction and real estate.

saasSelector.title: Choose Innexar's SaaS platform
saasSelector.subtitle: We offer two SaaS solutions: the multi-tenant Innexar ERP and StructurOne, focused on construction and real estate.

innexar.title: Innexar ERP
innexar.description: Multi-tenant, rebrandable ERP SaaS for small and medium businesses with inventory, sales, financial modules and more.
points: Subdomains per client with automatic provisioning

structurone.description: Specialized SaaS for developers and construction companies to manage projects, sales, investors and financials.
points: Modules for projects, investors and financials

feature2.title: Automated Provisioning
feature2.description: Instant subdomain creation, database setup, and user account provisioning upon subscription.

feature3.title: Enterprise Security
feature3.description: SSL encryption, role-based access control, audit logs, and compliance with industry standards.

feature4.title: Advanced Analytics
feature4.description: Real-time business intelligence, custom dashboards, and comprehensive reporting across all modules.

feature5.title: User Management
feature5.description: Granular permission system, team collaboration tools, and seamless user onboarding flows.

feature6.title: White-Label Ready
feature6.description: Complete customization of branding, domain, and user interface to match your company identity.

hero.title: We're a team of
hero.subtitle: Passionate professionals dedicated to delivering exceptional results. With years of experience in software development, infrastructure, and consulting, we help businesses transform and grow in the digital age.

about.title: About Innexar
about.subtitle: Leading the way in innovative technology solutions
about.description: We are a team of passionate technology experts dedicated to delivering exceptional results for our clients. With years of experience in software development, infrastructure, and consulting, we help businesses transform and grow in the digital age.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses worldwide with cutting-edge technology solutions that drive innovation, efficiency, and sustainable growth. We bridge the gap between complex technical challenges and business objectives, delivering measurable results that transform organizations.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted technology partner for businesses seeking digital transformation. We envision a future where every company, regardless of size, has access to enterprise-grade technology solutions that enable them to compete and thrive in the digital economy.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We constantly explore new technologies and methodologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions that keep our clients ahead of the curve.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We build trust through transparency, honesty, and ethical practices in every interaction and project we undertake.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: We believe in the power of teamwork, both within our organization and with our clients, to achieve exceptional outcomes.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We are committed to delivering the highest quality work, continuously improving our processes and exceeding expectations.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Milestones that shaped who we are today

items.title: Foundation
items.description: Innexar was founded with a vision to democratize enterprise technology solutions for businesses of all sizes.

items.title: First Major Clients
items.description: We successfully delivered our first enterprise projects, establishing our reputation for quality and reliability.

items.title: International Expansion
items.description: We expanded operations to the United States and Latin America, serving clients across multiple continents.

items.title: SaaS Platform Launch
items.description: We launched our first SaaS products, Innexar ERP and StructurOne, revolutionizing how businesses manage operations.

items.title: AI Integration
items.description: We integrated AI and machine learning capabilities into our solutions, enabling smarter, more automated business processes.

items.title: Industry Leadership
items.description: Today, we're recognized as a leader in digital transformation, serving 50+ clients with cutting-edge technology solutions.

technologies.title: Technologies We Master
technologies.subtitle: Our expertise spans the entire technology stack

certifications.title: Certifications & Standards
certifications.subtitle: We maintain the highest standards in security, quality, and compliance

process.title: From discovery to measurable growth in weeks
process.subtitle: Our senior team guides each initiative through an accelerated path that keeps stakeholders aligned and value shipping every sprint.

steps.title: Discovery & strategy
steps.description: Immersive workshops to understand goals, users, constraints and integrations while shaping the product vision.
steps.deliverable: Vision deck, success metrics, prioritised roadmap and technical landscape report.

steps.title: Experience & architecture
steps.description: UX flows, visual identity, data model and architecture decisions that future-proof the solution.
steps.deliverable: Interactive prototypes, design system foundations and architecture blueprint.

steps.title: Build & automate
steps.description: Agile delivery with CI/CD, QA, analytics and automations implemented alongside each increment.
steps.deliverable: Production-ready increments, automated tests, infrastructure as code and analytics tracking.

steps.title: Launch & growth
steps.description: Go-live orchestration, documentation, training and continuous optimisation backed by data.
steps.deliverable: Launch playbook, SLOs, dashboards, enablement sessions and roadmap for the next experiments.

successStories.title: Impact across industries
successStories.subtitle: We build platforms that unlock efficiency, revenue and delightful experiences for teams and customers.

cases.name: StructurOne
cases.challenge: Manual spreadsheets, disconnected teams and no visibility across multi-million construction projects.
cases.solution: Multi-tenant ERP with budgeting, procurement, document management and analytics, integrated with Stripe for billing and Procore for operations.
results: 85% faster budget approvals and field updates
Automated billing with multi-currency subscriptions
Executive dashboards with real-time project health

cases.name: Bluemart Marketplace
cases.challenge: Fragmented customer journeys and slow merchandising updates across 12 product categories.
cases.solution: Headless commerce architecture with CMS, promotions engine, AI recommendations and unified customer accounts.
results: 3x increase in add-to-cart conversions
Unified inventory sync across ERP, logistics and POS
Personalised experiences in three languages

cases.name: Helios Energy Field Ops
cases.challenge: Paper-based inspections and compliance data scattered across legacy systems.
cases.solution: Offline-first mobile apps for field engineers, automated reporting pipelines and compliance dashboards.
results: 40% reduction in inspection time
Audit-ready reports generated automatically
Predictive maintenance alerts powered by IoT streams

testimonials.title: Teams that grow with Innexar
testimonials.subtitle: We plug into your organisation as partners, not vendors.

items.quote: Innexar turned our product vision into a scalable platform while orchestrating design, engineering and growth. We launched a full SaaS in 90 days and the conversion uplift was immediate.
items.name: Carolina Mendes

items.quote: They rebuilt our logistics stack with APIs, automations and dashboards that finally gave the team real-time visibility. Releases now happen weekly without downtime.
items.name: Michael Turner

items.quote: Beyond code quality, the squad brought product thinking, analytics and experimentation. Our onboarding time dropped by half and customer NPS jumped to 72.
items.name: Ana Paula Ribeiro

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What's included in the base package?
faq.a1: 5-page responsive website, mobile optimization, contact forms, SEO basics, and 30 days of post-launch support.
faq.a2: Most sites are delivered within 5 business days after you complete the onboarding form.
faq.a3: You purchase and own your domain. We help you connect it to your new website at no extra charge.
faq.a4: 30 days of post-launch support is included. Extended support packages are available as an add-on.
faq.a5: After payment, you fill out a simple onboarding form. Our team designs your site, sends a preview, and after your feedback, we deliver.
